attributes.action: Stop the parking permit scheme in Milton west.
attributes.additional_details: Resident parking permits are coming into place on the 28/11/22 for Milton West. Residents living on Hamlet court road will not be allowed to apply for either resident or business parking permits. This will stop visitors shopping in the high street but also effect residents who live in the road.
attributes.background: Stop the parking permit scheme on Milton west coming into place on the 28/11/2022.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local parking are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
